title: Grammy CEO Emphasizes Eligibility of Music With AI-created Components
description: Harvey Mason Jr., CEO of the Recording Academy speaks during Grammys On The Hill: Advocacy Day in Washington on April 27, 2023. (Leigh Vogel/Getty Images for The Recording Academy)

title: The Dark Side of AI: 100,000 ChatGPT Accounts Stolen and Traded
description: Screens displaying the logos of OpenAI and ChatGPT in Toulouse, southwestern France, on Jan. 23, 2023. (Lionel Bonaventure/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Twitter CEO Backs Widely Criticized Tweet-Reading Rate Limits
description: The logo for Twitter on a screen on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) on June 1, 2022. (Brendan McDermid/Reuters)

title: Biden Official Says Social Media Companies Uncooperative in Addressing Fentanyl Crisis
description: DEA Administrator Anne Milgram speaks during a news conference at the Justice Department in Washington, on April 14, 2023. (Susan Walsh/AP Photo)

title: Cambodia Imposes Entry Ban on Meta’s Oversight Board Members
description: A post on Facebook by Cambodian government official Duong Dara, which includes an image of the official Facebook page of Cambodia's Prime Minister Hun Sen before he deleted his account, in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, on June 30, 2023. (Tang Chhin Sothy/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Zuckerberg Launching Twitter Rival Called ‘Threads’
description: This combination of file photographs created on June 22, 2023, shows SpaceX, Twitter and electric car maker Tesla CEO Elon Musk during his visit at the Vivatech technology startups and innovation fair at the Porte de Versailles exhibition center in Paris on June 16, 2023, (R) and Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg testifying before the House Financial Services Committee in the Rayburn House Office Building in Washington on Oct. 23, 2019. (Mandel Ngan, Alain Jocard/AFP via Getty Images)
